file_content.text: We should get moving. The Regulators seem distracted.
But they're mercenaries, aren't they? We could buy our way to safety.
You remember Kalveck, the art dealer? She marched right into the square with her credit box held high. Handed it to the Regulator sergeant.
He took the box, thanked her and shot her dead.
You're right. We should get moving.
